title: I just had an anti-booster on my team
body:
I didn't even know this was a thing, but someone who intentionally drags you down in placements so you can place in flex queue bronze 5.

like wtf. guy afk'd for 15 minutes just because "hey xin, just hold top for me, i'll bb in a bit" we had a huge lead and it just got ruined because the enemy team had a jungler where i was forced to top against an irelia while their elise got full control over drag and both jungles


seriously, flex queue is an abomination.

flex queue is a joke.

/TILT

....

.

why do i even play this game?
